name: Dragon Chronicle
overview:
Dragon Chronicle is a Strategy game, developed and published by Namco, which was released in Japan in 2002.

A touchscreen and card battle game. Your mission is to train your dragon and fight against other users. There are 6 types of dragon, include Light, Dark, Ice, Fire, Gold and Thunder. The game features an RPG like turn based battle system, you can issue 5 basic commands to your dragon: Shock, Magic, Guard, Shield and Pray. You can save your game to a memory card to continue in any arcade center.
